ygData.subject: Inn Key's & Backpack makeing
ygData.msgSnippet: In the Inn in Felewithe the inn keeper sells keys. I forget what they cost but in addition to the purchase cost there is a 1 copper per month fee on it. Does
ygData.messageBody:
In the Inn in Felewithe the inn keeper sells keys. I forget what they cost
but in addition to the purchase cost there is a 1 copper per month fee on
it. Does any one know what these keys are for? I bought one to try and when
I tried to sell it back the Inn Keeper told me " I don't want your house
keys!"
Also does anyone know what size sewing kit and what kind of pelt or hide
are required to make a backpack?
thanks for the help

Albryno
High Elf Wizard
